songs.title: First Impression
songs.lyrics:
[Speech from ?]
“And now… now we’re coming to a very important program we feel is vital.  We do believe in America.  We are the crossroads of America.  We believe that we’re the heart, the love, the strength of America.  We believe in bringing the [saved?] people that represent our feelings.  Like [?] 1975 [?], who is known throughout the world.  It’s my pleasure now to present to you…”
